org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.file.MetadataColumn

Packages that use MetadataColumn
Package
Description
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.file
Handles optional file metadata columns: implicit columns and partition columns.

  • Uses of MetadataColumn in org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.file

    Subclasses of MetadataColumn in org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.file
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FileMetadataColumn
    Represents projection column which resolved to a file metadata (AKA "implicit") column such as "filename", "fqn", etc.
    class 
    PartitionColumn
    Represents a partition column (usually dir0, dir1, ...).
